author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Golf Channel & Donald Trump's World of Golf host a Celebrity Match 1/25 @ TNGC LA, CA - Mark Wahlberg vs. Kevin Dillon http://bit.ly/4MubN6

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: from Donald Trump: "I saw Lady Gaga last night and she was fantastic!"

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: From Donald Trump: “I’m so proud of my wife Melania and the launch of her new jewelry line, to debut on QVC on April 30th at 9 p.m.”

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Donald Trump appeared on the final episode of The Jay Leno Show to deliver a very special message: http://bit.ly/cv1En7

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Don't forget the open call at Trump Tower tomorrow for The Apprentice. I look forward to seeing you there.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The NYC casting call for The Apprentice is thisThursday, April 1 at Trump Tower. For all the information you need, go to NBC.com/casting.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The original Apprentice is coming back--do you have what it takes to be the next Apprentice? For casting details: http://tinyurl.com/yly2c8u

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The Trump Hotel Collection is currently nominated for Conde Nast Traveler Readers Choice Awards, Travel & Leisure and World Travel Awards.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Last week's episode of the Celebrity Apprentice set the stage for a great new season. Tune in this Sunday on NBC for even more excitement.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: I am happy to announce that theoriginal Apprentice --which will offer job opportunities to those in need--is coming back.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Olympic Gold  Medalist Evan Lysacek just left my office. He is in town and wanted to meet me--he's a fanastic guy and a true champion.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The new season of the Celebrity Apprentice is off to a great start-- last night it swept the 10 p.m. hour in every key demographic.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Be sure to look for my beautiful wife Melania Trump tonight on QVC at 9 pm ET where she will be debuting her fantastic jewelry collection.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Melania will be on QVC tomorrow night at 9 p.m. ET to introduce her beautiful and inspiring Melania Timepieces & Fashion Jewelry collection.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Melania and I will be appearing on Larry King Live tonight, 9 p.m. on CNN. Be sure to tune in for some great conversation!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Our thoughts and prayers remain with Bret Michaels and his family and for his speedy recovery.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: To put on your calendar for May: Miss USA 2010, live from Las Vegas on May 16th, 7 p.m. ET on NBC. I'll be there--tune in for a great show!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Melania and I will be appearing on The View tomorrow at 11 a.m. on CBS. Tune in for some great fun!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Melania and I saw American Idiot on Broadway last night and it was great. An amazing  theatrical experience!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Tune in to The Marriage Ref onThursday night at 10 p.m. on NBC--I'm on the panel of experts along with Gloria Estefan & Adam Carolla.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: On Sunday, Jerome Bettis 'the bus' from the Pittsburgh Steelers will play at Trump Int'l Golf Club/Palm Beach against Julius Erving 'Dr J'

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: "Before Kids Can Go Places, They Need a Place To Go" -- the motto of The Police Athletic League, an organization I'm  very proud to support

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Looking forward to seeing the World Champion Yankees today on opening day!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text:
The premiere of "Donald J. Trump's Fabulous World of Golf" is tomorrow night at 9 p.m.
ET on Golf Channel. Tune in for a great adventure!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: This is a terrific day for downtown New York. Trump SoHo is unlike anything else. Be sure to visit this fantastic hotel soon!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text:
Trump SoHo opens this Friday and it is fantastic! Check out the Trump Hotel Collection...
http://www.trump.com/

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: My bestselling book from last April, Think Like a Champion, is now available in paperback. It's inspiring, entertaining, and a great read.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Then we attended the Scottish fashion show that benefits veterans, Dressed to Kilt 2010, which I co-hosted with Sir Sean and Lady Connery.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Wishing everyone a Happy Memorial Day Weekend, with a special thought for all the veterans who have done so much for our freedom.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The Dunes here are amazing, and  they're how I learned about geomorphology, which is the study of movement landforms. We've had a great trip

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The North Coast of Scotland is spectacular--the sea, the sand dunes, the rolling bluffs--we walked the course and it is fantastic.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Scotland is beautiful. I spent several years looking for the right place, visiting over 200 sites, and this is absolutely the right place!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The ratings for the Celebrity Apprentice were fantastic and everyone had a great time. It was a terrific season -- congrats to everyone!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Ivanka caught up with Bret and Holly backstage. Both Bret and Holly were champions all the way.   http://bit.ly/ckmKKU

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Congratulations to Bret Michaels, the new Celebrity Apprentice. Bret's a true champion, all of us were happy to see him and to see him win!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Who's your pick--@bretmichaels or @hollyrpeete ? Vote now on Ivanka's new Facebook page! http://ow.ly/1NfMt

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The latest update on Bret Michaels is that he's making every effort to attend the live finale of Celebrity Apprentice on Sunday--so tune in!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Check out Ivanka's new FaceBook page and keep up with what's happening--from The Celebrity Apprentice, to jewlery to free tickets and more..

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Put  this on your calendar: The Celebrity Apprentice live finale is this Sunday at 9 p.m. on NBC. Who will be the next Celebrity Apprentice?

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Congratulations to our new Miss USA,  the beautiful Rima Fakih.  Rima will represent us well at Miss Universe and be a wonderful Miss USA .

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Looking forward to the 2010 Miss USA Pageant, Sunday May 16 on NBC, 7 p.m. ET, hosted by Curtis Stone & Natalie Morales live from Las Vegas.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: We're all very happy to hear of Bret Michael's progress and send our best wishes for his full recovery.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Providing backstage commentary at the Miss USA Pageant will be comedic mother-daughter duo Joan and Melissa Rivers. A fantastic lineup!

text:

http://bit.ly/c9eZbq

text: Had a fantastic dinner last night at Quattro, in the Trump SoHo Hotel. It's already one of the hottest new restaurants in the city.

text: Tonight I trade places with Larry King @kingsthings and interview him on the 25th anniversary of his show. 9PM on CNN featuring best clips.

text: Be sure to watch the Larry King Show tomorrow night on CNN, 9 p.m. I'll be the host, Larry the guest. http://larrykinglive.blogs.cnn.com/

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: George Steinbrenner was a great friend and a true legend. There will never be anyone like him in New York. We've lost a truly great man.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The new edition of The Apprentice will be on Thursdays this fall at 10 pm ET---I'm putting people back to work!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Due to popular demand, CNN will re-broadcast  the Larry King Live show I hosted in June, in which I interview Larry. Monday July 5, 9 pm CNN

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Went to the Yankees game last night with Bill O'Reilly--we had a great time watching the Yankees win!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Spent a beautiful weekend golfing at Trump National Golf Club Westchester and Trump National Golf Club Bedminster.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The Miss Universe Pageant raked in some great ratings!  A great job by everyone.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Congratulations to Miss Mexico, Jimena Navarrete, our new Miss Universe 2010, and congratulations to everyone for a fantastic show.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: It's going to get hotter in Las Vegas tonight! Watch the Miss Universe Pageant tonight on NBC at 9 p.m. I'm looking forward to being there!

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: Four more days until the Miss Universe Pageant. Be sure to tune in on Monday night at 9 p.m. on NBC--it will be an amazing show.

author: @realDonaldTrump
text: The original Apprentice returns with a two hour premiere on Thursday September 16th. Looking forward to a fantastic season!

text: Watch CNN tomorrow at 2 pm & 5 pm and on Friday at 7 pm & 11 pm for a Thanksgiving Special hosted by John King. I'll be a featured guest.

text: Don't forget to watch Larry King tonight, CNN at 9 pm.  He's a television legend and a great friend. It's going to be a fantastic farewell.
